title: Deepcut
summary: Deepcut is a web API and interface that lets users discover random YouTube videos from curated playlists — perfect for finding new samples, inspiration, or tracks by chance.

title: mash-up
summary: mash-up is a music discovery web app that finds the best matching tracks for a reference song. It integrates with Spotify and AcousticBrainz to analyze BPM, key, and other audio features, then suggests compatible tracks.

title: ShreddBoard
summary: A minimal sticky-note application with shredding animation. Fast drag-and-drop, keyboard shortcuts, and persistent state.

title: Yolk
summary: Playful boiled‑egg timer microsite. Each recipe is a different cooking time with smooth micro‑interactions and accessibility built in.

title: Dark Spark
summary: A platformer game built for a Game Jam. Each time the hero is hit by an enemy, their torchlight weakens, reducing vision. To regain light (and health), the player must reach a fireplace. The hero starts with five torch charges.
